Posts.Content: I have just had my second FEC - it took 5 attempts to get a good vein so I am going to have a PICC line inserted before my next chemo in 3 weeks - don't want to go through what I had to this morning again..I had 3 different nurses trying to get a vein and had to put my hand / arm in almost  scalding water twice,  fingers crossed the PICC line goes in ok!
Posts.Title: Help ..... my veins are giving up !
